props.description: The content for the title of the alert.
props.title: title

props.description: Change the visual style of the alert.
props.title: appearance

props.description: Function to be passed on actioning the dismiss button.
props.title: onRemove

props.description: Determines if the alert is shown or not.
props.title: show

props.description: Height of the skeleton. Useful when you don't want to adapt the skeleton to a text element but for instance a card.
props.title: height

props.description: Width of the skeleton. Useful when the skeleton is inside an inline element with no width of its own.
props.title: width

props.description: This is an attribute used to identify a DOM node for testing purposes.
props.title: data-testid
